name: TioMio - My Vocation Puzzle
description:
What would you like to be when you grow up?

All your favourite vocations are hidden in TioMio. Find the right puzzle part and bring your character to life! As soon as you have finished the vocation puzzle the character starts to move and do their work. Funny little cartoons show every job in action.
Lively puzzle fun!

At the bottom you are shown how many vocations you have already created and which ones are left to do. If you tip on a character that you have already completed, you can play the little cartoon again.
There are twelve vocation puzzles to complete and bring to life in total:
police officer, ballerina, builder, gardener, astronaut, fireman, painter, diver, doctor, chef, farmer, chimney sweep

TioMio is not just a puzzle but also a building kit with which you can put together lots of funny and crazy characters. Once you have found a funny combination, you can take a photo of your creation using the camera button and show your parents and friends later on.
Thousands of possible combinations await you!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
This game promotes the recognition and matching of shapes and sounds.
Primary school children intuitively learn to find shapes and sounds that belong together and expand their attention span in an interactive way.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The attractive illustrations and excellent quality animations in this app were made by Elevision, who offers other popular education children's apps in the App Store:
BioMio - My first Biology App, RioMio - My Animated City, LinguPinguin - language learning, PumiLumi Band, PumiLumi Hide-and-Seek, PumiLumi Touch Zoo, Otto Karotto, Filifant - Trunk to the rescue!
